content: @Anne Baanen has made a really nice PR with the definition of bilinear forms. At some point in the theory, you need to konw that 2 is invertible in the base ring. We need to make a design choice here. I would like to have some more eyes and brains on this code. Will the current approach play well, or should we try something else?
½ is such a fundamental thing. Maybe it even makes sense to add a type class specifically for this.
I agree. Characteristic different from 2 is an assumption that shows up really often (notably when dealing with quadratic forms :)
